availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Bowmer (Cloverport, Breckinridge County, Kentucky, deputy clerk)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, deputy clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Bowmer. Deputy clerk in Breckinridge County, Kentucky in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 503.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Cloverport, p. 552.
